message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the use of Bayesian optimal experimental design techniques for generating glimpse sequences to use in semi-supervised training of hard attention networks. This involves employing such networks for image classification, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the challenges of training hard attention networks, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of reinforcement learning (RL) techniques for training the stochastic policy, which is a subfield of both machine learning and artificial intelligence. Finally, the paper discusses the potential impact of their method on natural language processing (NLP), which falls under computational linguistics (cs.CL).
